answers.answer: I was the same was sick once n felt fine up until about 28 weeks then I got an infection . Diabetes n have anemia so I couldn't get away with it all lol
I'm 27+5 and this morning i feel like crap! It feels like the ribs under my left boobie are broken..it hurts so bad to move and to get up
Oh man 27+ don't seem to nice. I better enjoy this then. Hope u ladies feel better soon.
Im feeling ok in my self and only gor 6 weeks left now so hope stays this way. Hope u get a easy ride for rest of it
Me too. & lucky you I can't wait for this to be over
I wish I could say that massive migraines on a daily basis and upset tummy and vomit everyday I'm almost 11 weeks! .this time around is rough
22 weeks 4 days cant complain but I do have leaky boobs lol

Well I hope It'll stay that way for you! I had morning sickness about 5 times In the first trimester but other than that, I've been feelin' great! My constant hunger has died down a bit which means less acid reflex, and sleep has gotten somewhat better other than wakin' up constantly In the night to go pee lol. Everythin' has been good. =]

question: I'm 19+2 and I feel great haven't gotten sick no vomit no upset tummy no headaches nothing I don't even feel pregnant is it ok to feel that great? How far are u ladies and how do u feel?
title: How are u ladies feeling?
